meanings: 대화 도중 Stop beating around the bush.
대화 도중 Cut to the chase!
대화 도중 What is your point?
대화 도중 I won't tell anyone.
대화 도중 I won't tell a soul.
대화 도중 You can be assured that this won't leak.

vlive.korean: [저 형이 또?!] 에어컨 말하지 말라고! [Again?] Don't say that. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[불안] 아니야, 그런 말 하지 마! [Nervous] Don't say such things. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[두근][두근] - 말하지 마, 말하지 마 - 된다, 됐다! [Heart beating] - Don't talk, don't talk. - It's working, it's done! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Heart beating] - Don't talk, don't talk. - It's working, it's done!

vlive.korean: 말하지 못할... But we couldn't say... 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
말하지 말걸! We shouldn't have said so! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] YO~ 미니’어처’ 만드는 껌딱지즈 ‘어처’구니 없게 귀엽다 YO~ (SOOBIN&HUENINGKAI making miniature food)

examples.korean: He upped and left without telling anyone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아무에게도 말하지 않고 갑자기 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He upped and left without telling anyone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We no longer talk of the permanence of marriage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 더 이상 결혼생활의 영속성을 말하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We no longer talk of the permanence of marriage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He reproached himself for not telling her the truth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀에게 진실을 말하지 않은 것을 자책했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He reproached himself for not telling her the truth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t tell me how it ends—I haven't read it all the way through yet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 어떻게 끝나는지 말하지 마. 내가 그걸 아직 다 안 읽었으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t tell me how it ends—I haven't read it all the way through yet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The answer is no, period! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대답은 안 된다야. 더 이상 말하지 마! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The answer is no, period! Add to Wordbook
